name: One Piece: Romance Dawn
description: Experience the One Piece story for the first time ever in RPG format on the Nintendo 3DS! Level-up your characters and choose your own path to become King of Pirates! Join the Straw Hat Crew to defeat powerful enemies using a turn-based battle system and discover ingredients that will make your crew unique. You play, you decide, you make the adventure yours in this One Piece RPG on 3DS! FEATURES Play and customize your favorite Straw Hat Crew member! Famous stages from popular story arcs of ONE PIECE including Orange Town, Baratie, Arlong Park Fight against famous enemies such as Buggy, Arlong, Crocodile, and more Experience the 3D illustrated One Piece world. Grand stream action: decide which path to take. Grand Tactical Battle: Input commands using an active turn based battle system. Grand Chain: Activate devastating attacks to wipe out enemies! Craft new items: combine various ingredients to obtain new items!
